long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a "port knocking" app.
It isnt directly port-knocking, beccause it sends a secret package instead of a sequence of packagesto diffrent ports.

It requires a server daemon you can download from my website.
